1.content: What character do you want to choose?
1.title: Pick a character

choices: in her room at the Goh-Rong
With Ching at the Turtle Training Hall
11.title: Pucca

choices: Pucca follows Ching to her room
Pucca asks what Ching wants to do.
113.content:
(Pucca and Ching both are hanging around in the mian hall of the Turtle training hall)

Ching: Hey, Pucca, can you come with me to my room? there's something I want us to do.

Pucca: hmm....
113.title: With Ching at the Turtle Training Hall

choices: Pucca decides to cooperate with Ching.
Pucca shakes her head in refusal
1131.content:
(Pucca nods at Ching and follows her into her room, here Pucca sees a diaper mat on Ching's bed.)

Ching: now, Pucca, I want you to lay on that mat.)

Pucca: hmm.....
1131.title: Pucca follows Ching to her room

choices: I actually wear diapers too, I wanted you to join in."
11311.content:
(Pucca lays on the diaper mat on Ching's bed, Ching takes Pucca's shirt off.)

Pucca: Huh?

Ching: just relax, I'm not done yet.

(Ching pulls off Pucca's pants, then her panties, rendering Pucca completely naked, Pucca covers her upper and lower half with her hands, only for Ching to take her hands and gently move them away.)

Ching: ah, ah, ahhh, don't cover yourself.

(Ching takes some baby powder and applies it to Pucca's naked butt, she then take a diaper and slides it on Pucca, she then tapes the diaper on Pucca and pats it.)

Ching: there, all done!

(Pucca sits up)

Ching: you're probubly wondering why I did that, well...
11311.title: Pucca decides to cooperate with Ching.

113111.content:
Ching: I want to, and am going to, baby you, Pucca. Do you think that will be fun?

Pucca: hmmm... (think and looks at herself wearing absolutely nothing but a diaper.)
113111.title: "I want to baby you, pucca."

1131111.content:
(Pucca nods)

Ching: That's good to know, Pucca, now...
1131111.title: Pucca says yes.

choices: Ching, without fuss, takes Pucca to the bathroom.
Pucca  wrestles Ching to the ground and strips her naked.
11311112.content:
Ching: It's time we give you a bath, Pucca.

(Ching takes Pucca's diaper off, rendering Pucca completely naked again. Ching starts picking Pucca up.)

Ching: now, let's get you to the bathroom, and get you nice and squeaky clean.
11311112.title: "Time you had a bath"

113111121.content:
(Ching carries the naked Pucca to the bathroom, there, she puts Pucca in an empty bathtub and fills it with warm water.)

Ching: would you like this to be a bubble bath?
113111121.title: Ching, without fuss, takes Pucca to the bathroom.

choices: Pucca puts Ching in a diaper.
Pucca wants Ching to bathe with her.
113111122.content:
(Pucca grabs Ching and wrestles her down to the ground,)

Ching: Pucca! what are you doing?

(Pucca then takes all of Ching's clothes off, leaving her completely naked as well.)

Ching: okay, I guess I deserved it for just stripping you naked as sudden as I did. what else are you planning to do?
113111122.title: Pucca  wrestles Ching to the ground and strips ...

choices: One of the Vegabonds (Chief, Clown, or Shaman)
15.title: other.

info.brief_description: pick a Pucca character and choose a path.
info.description:
Pick a character from the TV show Pucca, and choose the adventure.

1) no out-of-charcter at all.

2)canon Pucca characters are NOT allowed to die.

3) I encourage diapering Pucca characters.
